sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_5cd71cee83fa0210ae8dc4a6feaad3a4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_aha_integration</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Upload Attachment To Aha Application</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	try { 
		var attach=new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
		attach.addQuery('table_sys_id',current.sys_id);
		attach.addQuery('table_name','u_aha_integration');
		attach.query();

		if(attach.getRowCount()==1)
		{	
				if(attach.next())
		{
gs.print(attach.file_name.toString());
 var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('Aha Integrations', 'Add Attchment on Comments');
// r.setStringParameterNoEscape('name', 'DX_Undertaking_Abhijeet Pawar (1).pdf');

gs.print(attach.file_name);
 r.setStringParameterNoEscape('name', attach.file_name);

 var response = r.execute();
 var responseBody = response.getBody();
 var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
 gs.print(httpStatus);
}
		}
	else
		{
			while(attach.next())
			{
gs.print("Line 31"+attach.file_name.toString());
 var r1 = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('Aha Integrations', 'Add Attchment on Comments');
// r.setStringParameterNoEscape('name', 'DX_Undertaking_Abhijeet Pawar (1).pdf');


 r1.setStringParameterNoEscape('name', attach.file_name);




 var response1 = r1.execute();
 var responseBody1 = response1.getBody();
 var httpStatus1 = response1.getStatusCode();

 gs.print(httpStatus1);
}
		}
		}
catch(ex) {
 var message = ex.message;
 gs.print(message);
}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-17 17:30:04</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5cd71cee83fa0210ae8dc4a6feaad3a4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Upload Attachment To Aha Application</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_5cd71cee83fa0210ae8dc4a6feaad3a4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-17 18:36:39</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async_always</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=5cd71cee83fa0210ae8dc4a6feaad3a4"/></record_update>
